name: VIRTUAL EDUCA CONNECT
content: The meeting revolves around three main axes, technology and connectivity, essential to advance in this digital age, and innovation to meet new social needs. The objective of exchanging knowledge, debating ideas and learning about technological advances in education for social transformation worldwide, seeking synergies and involving the public, business, academic and civil society sectors. In this very special year, Virtual Educa is proposed as a reference scenario where to share the most recent experiences and learning from educational systems in the face of the impact of the global health crisis, identify the challenges of the immediate future and test the responses. URLs: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/650060-2?pid=4868 Exhibitor: https://go.evvnt.com/650060-3?pid=4868 Prices: Teachers, students and heads of educational institutions and networks: EUR 10.00, Startups (Under five years old): EUR 99.00, Corporations (Companies, organizations): EUR 200.00, VIP access: EUR 500.00, Representatives of the academic sector: EUR 23.00 Time: 09:00 - 18:00
